Name: Green Horn
Ingredients: 45 ml Caribbean blended rum aged 6-10 years
15 ml Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of pineapple wedge & Luxardo Maraschino Cherry .
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker.
Review: Far more interesting and serious than the green hue from the melon liqueur would suggest.
Nutrition: One serving of Green Horn contains 218 calories
